ygData.subject: Re: Glowing Wooden Crook
ygData.msgSnippet: I heard it was put in just for Guides and GM s so they can carry around those staffs of wisdom or whatever they have ... From: Iceman007Z@aol.com
ygData.messageBody:
I heard it was put in just for Guides and GM's so they can carry around
those staffs of wisdom or whatever they have
-----Original Message-----
From: Iceman007Z@... <Iceman007Z@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>

Subject: Re: [eqbards] Glowing Wooden Crook


>From: Iceman007Z@...
>
>
>
>OK Im confused Im a Level 23 bard on Eci and I have never tried to use 2
>handed becasue It was to my thought we could not do so but yet we had it in
>our skills ...It allows us to Wield a 2 HB Glowing Wooden Crook but not to
>raise our Skill in it ? what kind of crap is this ? Id love to be able to
>raise my Skill up with it can anyone explain to me ?
>
>Icemann Blazenfrost
